message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for (Column cell : cf) {
  ByteBuffer columnName = cell.name();
  ByteBuffer columnValue = cell.value();
  String name = ByteBufferUtil.string(columnName);
  String value = ByteBufferUtil.string(columnValue);
  log(" name = " + name);
  log(" value = " + value);
}
<<<explanation>>>: In the trigger's augment method, you can iterate over the columns in the ColumnFamily using a for-each loop. Each column has a name and a value, which you can access using the name() and value() methods respectively. You can then convert the ByteBuffer values to strings using ByteBufferUtil.string().
